docs.snippet: The Russian purchasing mission that recently was sent to Argentina not only has purchased hides, leather and shoes in that country, but has extended its activities to Brazil and Uruguay, where it has bought additional hides and leather, it was...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Russian purchasing mission that recently was sent to Argentina not only has purchased hides, leather and shoes in that country, but has extended its activities to Brazil and Uruguay, where it has bought additional hides and leather, it was learned yesterday.
